title: Mbitr
author: Mbitr
content: 9years ago today, a new word was formed ….hodlingI’m sure the OP never thought the word would be so important in the Bitcoin world and that It’s been used as a rally cry.I wonder if the OP ever looks back at this post ??https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=375643.2600

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Shame on me, I was already aware the wideworld spread term hodl was due to a crypto user mispelling it somewhere ...bu, despite registering on this forum a couple of weeks after that epic post was written, I was somehow still missing it.Thanks for filling this gap, merit deserved.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Wow finding such posts in the archives deserve merit. This is a legendary thread, I wonder if the OP is still active here. I would like to know how long he did hodl for…whew…as far back as 2013, posts like this reminds me how lucky I am to be part of this community. I could be a part of bitcoin history by just contributing on bitcointalk, one drunk post could become something that will be remembered for years to come.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Not yet here when that word was first used. It's initially what I understand as well when they say HODL which is to hold and not sell even in the bear market. But recently some of the BTC holders gave it a meaning like "hold on for dear life". I'm not sure when it started but that's now what they mean.HODL is associated with Bitcoin as part of the lingo to use. GameKyuubi seems to be here still, the last time he logged in was July 20, 202. He must be Hodling tight still.

comments.author: lostbox66
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on December 18, 2022, 03:36:19 PMWow finding such posts in the archives deserve merit. This is a legendary thread, I wonder if the OP is still active here. I would like to know how long he did hodl for…whew…as far back as 2013, posts like this reminds me how lucky I am to be part of this community. I could be a part of bitcoin history by just contributing on bitcointalk, one drunk post could become something that will be remembered for years to come. It's interesting how such simple things can have an influence on the community. I enjoy looking at posts from years ago, it's neat to see how it was so only on in the Bitcoin history.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on December 18, 2022, 03:09:30 PM9years ago today, a new word was formed ….hodlingI’m sure the OP never thought the word would be so important in the Bitcoin world and that It’s been used as a rally cry.funny how the first time that I heard about it I thought it was some kind of acronym and had to search around about what it meant and found out that it was just a typo. Quote from: Mbitr on December 18, 2022, 03:09:30 PMI wonder if the OP ever looks back at this post ??probably, looking at his account his last log-in was in July this year. besides, if it were me I would definitely do the same, it's rare that a word you misspelt would become a huge thing to a community.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: It's pretty crazy to think that we have been using the term HODL since 2013, but I think that one topic is the craziest Bitcointalk topic ever!"I AM HODLING" It is your 9th anniversary! Congratulations.

comments.author: Welsh
comments.body: It's quite funny what catches on, since OP probably had no intention of it doing so, and zero expectations. It's mad also how many things have came from the forum, and have basically caught on outside of it. This term has been used my several major news sources, and I'm pretty sure the BBC did a article explaining what it meant. I'll have to see if I can find it or if I'm just misremembering that. This forum is covered in history like this though, which reaches well beyond just the forum.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: I think my favourite part of the post is the whisky/whiskey conundrum in the OPs thoughts   Who would have thought that a few drinks would lead to such a classic moment in Bitcoin’s history

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: It has been the history of the word HODL with 9 years ago reminding us of this word against bitcoin which is often spoken by someone and associated with it, this word will never be forgotten and has become a slogan for old Bitcoin holders.If someone asks me about bitcoin, what is the best advice for investing in bitcoin: I say buy bitcoin and HODL.There is nothing more beautiful than HODL, all Bitcoin holders already know about HODL.

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: I don't know if it was initially used on purpose or not, as writing hodling accidentally is also quite likely (I often do it by accident and then decide to just keep it there). In any case, it became a word of its own with its special context and meaning. Thanks, op, for noticing that it's the anniversary. Hodling is still a good strategy, especially if a person knows that they are a bad trader. And the author of the original 2013 post is right that if the price is low, it's a good time to buy and hodl. As we're still in the times of the bear market, perhaps this reminder will motivate some to grab this opportunity.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: I was a month late after this post before I registered in this forum.  The first time I encountered the word seems like a misspelled word but never that I know that the word Hodling will have its own meaning in the dictionary.It is funny to think that a drunk person has created a new term in history and become a popular strategy for those who aren't good enough to do trading.  It is always a good feeling when something popular comes out in this forum.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: I remember reading this thread in early 2014 before I even made this account. I kept reading the forum for a while with little dedication. It was a different world with all the Gox FUD. The situation with FTX reminds me of it a bit. If we only knew how insignificant the 2013 crash will be in the big picture none of us would ever panic in 2014 or 2015 and those were some really painful years with Chinese bans and people preaching death of bitcoin. Congratulations to all the people who kept holding in 2013 and are still doing it. You guys are the big winners in this game and don't let traders who caught the top and sold tell you otherwise.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: I did not know about history of HODL and HODLers. In Terminology, these words are not listed but your topic helps me to learn a little more about Bitcoin Terminology.You're a true legend by sharing.Newbies easily think it is typo, hold not hodl and holder not hodler.

comments.author: Gallar
comments.body: It seems that you are very persistent in looking for this very high-quality post, to be honest, I just found out that there was a post like this first,I think the word hodling was not born from a post, but it turns out that the word hodling was born from a post.now I wonder if there will be any other words created?

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on December 18, 2022, 07:39:44 PMIt has been the history of the word HODL with 9 years ago reminding us of this word against bitcoin which is often spoken by someone and associated with it, this word will never be forgotten and has become a slogan for old Bitcoin holders.If someone asks me about bitcoin, what is the best advice for investing in bitcoin: I say buy bitcoin and HODL.There is nothing more beautiful than HODL, all Bitcoin holders hodlers already know about HODL.Fixed a mistype on your side  By the way user GameKyuubi was challenging other people into suing him for mispelling wiskey but actually funny thing is  if he had registered some sort of trademark on that word he "minted" in that epic thread  he could sue 90% of crytpocurrency users if not more lol

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: This guy is a big motivation for Bitcoin enthusiast to become a strong hand in order to make huge return in the future, people who read his post and take it seriously already become a millionaire right now. It's just sad that many people at that time didn't take his word seriously and think it's just a joke since he's still drunk. While right now many people can easily trust a self pro called economist or professional trader that most of them are complete liar.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Happy 9th anniversary HODLERS.Thanks to gamekyuubi for inventing that word that's been widely used until today and will surely be used forever. Even in the stocks, I'm seeing people using the term.That's a vast usage now and indeed what a word that just came from a drunk man that has given his emotional sentiment.

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: I genuinely didn't know that the story started here on this forum

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I also suffered when I heard this term (HODL) for the first time, I did not know what it meant until I searched the Internet and learned that it was a typo of a member of the BitcoinTalk forum that turned into a popular term in the Bitcoin world (the article was on Binance Academy).But what amazed me was that this member (who had this famous typing error) is now a Sr. Member only, although he has been registered on the forum since June 19, 2011, as shown on his profile.It is clear that he has little activity in the forum and that he did not make good use of the fame he gained.
